productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 960 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice stationery set
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful set! Lovely colors!!This would make a great gift!As described.Perfect size and it’s nice that the sheets are lined.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My love pours onto the pages
reviews.reviewText: Sometimes I get lonely...it's only human. My boyfriend (Randy) works away from home at a bear farm so he's usually absent from our home during the week. I share our home with our dog (Mr Sparkles) and although he's great company, sometimes my mind wanders and heart aches for Randy's touch. I like to use the stationery to write letters to Randy, just like we would if he was off to war. I will compose my thoughts into long paragraphs and let him know how he makes me feel. The pages are fairly durable and often soak up tear drops that end up on the page. The stationery can also hold scents quite well, although I'd recommend using a scented lotion over a body spray. The oils in the lotion will fuse with the paper better and allow for the paper to smell for 60-70% longer than a traditional body spray. Being around bears all day, Randy doesn't have the best workplace smellscape. He says that my scented letters are a welcome change for when he gets back to his living quarters that he shares with the other workers.If you're a postal worker and you see one of my letters pass through your sorting station, take a sniff...you won't be disappointed. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Envelopes have no adhesive
reviews.reviewText: Cute stationary. Envelopes have no adhesive though at all. Comes with some kind of random stickers that I assume are intended to seal them. But you have to use like three or four if you plan on mailing these to make sure the envelope is totally closed.Won’t order again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value, quantity. Style note**
reviews.reviewText: These sets of stationary are great!**The paper is only colored/lined on one side; otherwise, these would have been perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Stationary: Exactly as Advertised
reviews.reviewText: Stationery is individually wrapped in sets of four papers with two envelopes each. This way the unused stationery remains in pristine condition until you are ready to use it. I'm very pleased. Writing letters has become a lost art, but I still like to write them. Stickers to seal the envelopes are also included. Whether you use them or not, it's a nice touch. I highly recommend this stationery. It would be fine as thank-you notes, too! I think the pack contains about 32 pages of stationery and 14 envelopes, plus the stickers. Thanks for a high-quality item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty, colorful paper
reviews.reviewText: This stationery is as vibrantly-colored as shown. I bought it because I wanted to write more letters to family in 2021. It will be pleasant writing on this pretty paper and will brighten up the day for the receivers. Finally, "Do a better job of keeping in touch" will be one New Year 's resolution kept.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Great colors. I got these to write letters to my sister, and I know the bright colors will catch her eye and hopefully brighten her day. Each little packet comes with 2 envelopes and 4 sheets of paper. Really cute and colorful. Would order again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Colors Less Bright
reviews.reviewText: Firstly, the colors are much less saturated in person, a filter has clearly been used on the product page.Other Cons:The envelopes do not come with adhesive, you will need to use tape or stickers.They are packaged in sets of two envelopes and four sheets of paper, so that’s a lot of plastic going in a landfill.Pros:The paper is decent quality and my ink did not feather overly much. It’s smooth with a medium tooth.The inside of the envelopes are dyed to match the paper which is fun.All in all, as long as you come in with the expectation that the colors are misrepresented, it’s ok. But I was very disappointed by the misrepresentation and if these were going to be a gift for a child, that would be a very upset kid.
